apps.title: Apps
apps.banner: Cloudflare Apps are deprecated and will be discontinued in the near future. We recommend you uninstall any apps connected to this website. Let us know if you have any feedback by filling out this [survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1fJOT5u7EvcalafPfQlfchLGvDLfC4-Rc-p-YmTVwI6g).
apps.deprecation.title: We are deprecating Cloudflare Apps
apps.deprecation.subtitle: Cloudflare Apps are deprecated and will be discontinued in the near future. Let us know if you have any feedback.
